quotes.text: I have measured out my life with coffee spoons.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.text: Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.text: I was taken by the power that savoring a simple cup of coffee can have to connect people and create community.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.text: But even a bad cup of coffee is better than no coffee at all. New York has great water for coffee.
quotes.author: David Lynch
